CustomField.description: I acknowledge that transmitting personal information via mail comes with inherent risks including the risk that the information will be exposed to unauthorized individuals. I understand the risks associated with my chosen method for receiving information pertaining to my request and accept responsibility for any unauthorized access occurring after Pearson Online & Blending Learning sends my information in the chosen method.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Consumer acknowledges risks inherent in choosing to have their information report delivered via physical mail
CustomField.label: Physical Mail Risk Acknowledgement
